problem.fixMessage: Link in BPEL must be unique - remove either "A" or "AA".
problem.message: The link "A" is not unique - the link "AA" also makes an identical connection.
problem.ruleDescription: Two different links MUST NOT share the same source *and* target activities; that is, at most one link may be used to connect two activities.
